frontmatter.author: Jeff Kosseff
frontmatter.title: It is important to publish the unedited words to allow the readers to access the full scope of the harms suffered by victims.

frontmatter.author: Thomas Paine
frontmatter.title: Vices of those who would repress the opinions of others is they make themselves prisoners of their own opinions because they deny themselves the right and the means of changing them.
